thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mimecast Reports Q3 Revenue Rose 39 Pct To $67.3 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mimecast Reports Q3 Revenue Rose 39 Pct To $67.3 Mln
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Mimecast Ltd:
* MIMECAST ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03
* Q3 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.05 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $259.6 MILLION TO $260.3 MILLION * SEES Q4 2018 REVENUE $71.1 MILLION TO $71.8 MILLION * Q3 REVENUE ROSE 39 PERCENT TO $67.3 MILLION * FOR FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $23.9 MILLION TO $24.9 MILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02, REVENUE VIEW $64.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍INTRODUCING A RANGE FOR 2019 REVENUE GROWTH​ * ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR Q4 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $5.4 MILLION TO $6.4 MILLION.
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $68.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
